description.p: A tool to compare mono audio files in time and frequency.

DFasma is an open-source software used to compare audio files in time and frequency. The comparison is first visual, using wavforms, spectra and spectrogram. Listening segments of the loaded files is also possible in order to allow perceptual comparison.
